entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
